item.title: Version 1.2.0B3
item.description:
This is the second of the heavily updated versions of Medusa. It is **NOT** backwards compatible. This version took some user reviews into account.

New features

  • Support for SheepShaver
  • Ability to import existent preferences
  • Ability to '''really''' kill the emulator's process
  • Ability to delete the NVRAM file
  • Partial support for keycodes file
  • Ability to resolve path of files that moved or were renamed
  • Display emulators' list according to ROM file, then first available emulator
  • Toggle button per line in the VM's list window, instead of buttons in the footer

Under the hood

  • Major re-factoring to detect emulator's supported models
